name: Flipside Fairytales: The Little Mermaid
description:
Explore Ahriul's undersea kingdom and prince Trey's land-based kingdom as Ahriul finds a way to make the impossible happen to give true love a chance.

  • Talk to your undersea subjects.
  • Explore spooky undersea depths.
  • Gain fancy grabbers and chest lumps through *MAGIC*!
  • Try to not be murdered.
  • Try to not die by other means, either.

The Little Mermaid is a visual novel by Rebekah Gall

All games by the 2018 Moosader Interns:

  • Dance Competition by Alexa Summers
  • Dog Show by Rose Morris
  • Ghosts by Shawnee Williams
  • The Little Mermaid by Rebekah Gall
